title: Nox AT10 Lux CoolGrey/Georgia Peach Padel Shoes
description:
The first padel shoe designed for your health, clinically endorsed and laboratory certified.
NOX shoes have been specifically designed to minimize the risk of injury and optimize the performance of the padel player.

Nox AT10 Lux CoolGrey/Georgia Peach Padel Shoes clinically endorsed by Marta Rueda, podiatrist at the Martín Rueda Center for Foot Studies, advisor to the Center for High Performance Sports in Sant Cugat (Spain) and hundreds of elite athletes.

The AGG (Advanced Gravity Geometry) technology provides a greater “drop” (height of the heel with respect to the toe), facilitating the waiting position and the starts in the race of the player. Reduces the overload of the calves and MINIMIZES THE RISK OF muscle INJURIES.

Greater STABILITY thanks to the LATERAL SUPPORT technology, which provides a greater contact surface of the sole with the ground and minimizes the risk of twisting in lateral movements.

Optimal GRIP sole that combines the herringbone pattern with small studs.

Maximum CUSHIONING and energy return thanks to the Strobel assembly of the popcorn-type EVA rubber sole and the low-density injected phylon midsole. Internal lateral reinforcement (AbraXone) to increase abrasion resistance and provide the shoe with greater stability.

Antibacterial insole that maximizes SUPPORT and COMFORT. Resistant to deformations resulting from continued use.

title: Nox AT10 Lux Shoes White/Grey
description:
Nox AT10 Lux Shoes

The first padel shoe designed for your health, clinically endorsed and laboratory certified:
NOX shoes have been specifically designed to minimise the risk of injury and optimise padel player performance.

- With the collaboration of Marta Rueda, podiatrist from the Martín Rueda Foot Studies Centre, podiatrists from the Sant Cugat High Performance Sports Centre (Spain) and hundreds of elite sportsmen.

AGG 
- AGG (Advanced Gravity Geometry) technology provides a greater “drop” (heel height in relation to the toe), facilitating the player’s standby position and run starts. Reduces plantar fasciitis and calf overload, MINIMIZING THE RISK OF MUSCLE INJURY

Lateral support:
- Greater STABILITY thanks to LATERAL SUPPORT technology, which provides greater surface contact between the sole and the floor and minimises the risk of twisting when moving sideways.

Grip:
- Optimal GRIP sole combines herringbone pattern with small studs.

AbraXone:
- Maximum CUSHIONING and energy return thanks to the mounted Strobel of the popcorn EVA rubber sole and the low density injected phylon midsole. Inner lateral reinforcement (AbraXone) to increase abrasion resistance and provide the shoe with greater stability.

Ortholite®:
- Maximum COMFORT and STRENGTH with the Ortholite® insole, which improves support and comfort.

title: Nox Padel Shoes AT10 Lux LIMITED EDITION
description:
The new Nox AT10 LUX LIMITED EDITION Padel Shoes specifically selected by Agustin Tapia

Along with the other models, AT10 and ML10 HEXA, are the first padel shoes specifically designed for your health, clinically approved and laboratory certified.

All Nox padel shoes have been designed and manufactured with the aim of minimizing the risk of injury and optimizing the performance of any padel player.

Clinically endorsed by Marta Rueda, podiatrist at "Centro de Estudios del Pie Martín Rueda", advisor of the High Performance Sports Center of Sant Cugat (Spain) and hundreds of elite athletes.

Nox padel shoes are laboratory tested and certified by INESCOP Footwear Technology Center in Alicante, Spain. 

Technologies:

AGG (Advanced Gravity Geometry) technology provides a greater “drop” (heel height in relation to the toe), facilitating the player’s standby position and run starts. Reduces plantar fasciitis and calf overload, MINIMIZING THE RISK OF MUSCLE INJURY

Greater STABILITY thanks to LATERAL SUPPORT technology, which provides greater surface contact between the sole and the floor and minimizes the risk of twisting when moving sideways.

Optimal GRIP sole combines herringbone pattern with small studs.

Maximum CUSHIONING and energy return thanks to the mounted Strobel of the popcorn EVA rubber sole and the low density injected phylon midsole. Inner lateral reinforcement (AbraXone) to increase abrasion resistance and provide the shoe with greater stability.

Ortholite insole for maximum COMFORT in the game. It features excellent cushioning to reduce the feeling of fatigue. In addition, its anti-microbial action prevents the accumulation of bacteria and odor. Provides optimum performance without adding weight to the shoe.

title: Nox AT10 Lux Nero Padel Shoes
description:
The First Padel Shoes Designed For Your Health, Clinically Endorsed And Laboratory Certified

Nox AT10 Lux Nero Padel Shoes are specifically engineered to minimize the risk of injury and enhance padel player performance. Collaborating with Marta Rueda, a podiatrist from the Martín Rueda Foot Studies Centre, podiatrists from the Sant Cugat High Performance Sports Centre in Spain, and hundreds of elite sportsmen, these shoes have been tested in the laboratory and certified by the Footwear Technology Centre Inescop in Alicante, Spain.


Agg (Advanced Gravity Geometry): Provides a greater "drop" (heel height in relation to the toe), facilitating the player's standby position and run starts. Reduces plantar fasciitis and calf overload, minimizing the risk of muscle injury.


Lateral Support: Offers greater stability with Lateral Support Technology, which provides more surface contact between the sole and the floor, minimizing the risk of twisting during lateral movements.


Grip: Optimal grip sole combines a herringbone pattern with small studs for excellent tractio


Cushioning: Maximum cushioning and energy return thanks to the mounted Strobel of the Popcorn EVA rubber sole and the low-density injected Phylon midsole. Inner lateral reinforcement (Abraxone) increases abrasion resistance and provides greater stability.


Comfort and Strength: Maximum comfort and durability with the Ortholite® insole, which improves support and comfort.

title: Intrigue Tour Women's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

FIT: Engineered for Women's Padel Play
Specifically engineered around the biomechanics of a woman’s foot, the Intrigue Tour Padel delivers a secure and supportive fit. The FootFrame dynamic support system wraps the midfoot for a locked-in feel that adapts to every movement, while its contoured shape ensures comfort without sacrificing stability.

FEEL: Lightweight & Responsive:
Crafted to move like a running shoe, the single-layer UltraShield mesh upper keeps the shoe breathable and light. Underfoot, a supercritical Pebax foam sockliner provides soft, responsive cushioning that energizes every step from first serve to match point.

FUNCTION: Stability & Speed for Padel:
Purpose-built for the demands of padel, this shoe combines a SwiftStep TPU torsion shank and CMP foam midsole for stability and power, while a Duralast outsole and padel-specific traction pattern deliver optimum grip. Quick pivots, agile turns, and explosive movements come naturally on court.

title: Hurakn Pro V2 Women's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

FIT: Designed for the Female Foot
Asymmetrical and elongated heel counter is specifically designed for a woman's narrower heel and higher arch, resulting in better stability and control.

FEEL: Tuned Comfort and Responsiveness
Lower-density EVA foam cushioning improves comfort, maximizes responsiveness, and enables multidirectional agility.

FUNCTION: Padel - All Court
Lightweight support chassis provides stability with the right amount of flex. Biometrically engineered outsole enables excellent rotational traction.

title: Hurakn Pro V2 Men's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

FIT: Secure, Lightweight and Breathable
Full inner sock construction plus recycled TPU and mesh upper provides an intuitive fit that molds to the shape of your foot.

FEEL: Plush Playability
Molded sockliner along an EVA foam midsole with a 9 mm heel-toe drop offers a perfect balance of comfort and playability.

FUNCTION: Padel - All Court
Lightweight support chassis provides lateral stability with optimal flex for quick turns and bursts of speed on the court.

title: Hurakn Lite Women's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

FIT: Lightweight, Breathable, and Comfortable
The engineered mesh upper allows for maximum airflow, providing a lightweight and breathable fit. This ensures comfort even during intense play, keeping feet cool and dry.

FEEL: Responsive and Cushioned
Equipped with Fused 8 Foam and Ortholite sockliner, the Hurakn Lite offers a responsive midsole with excellent cushioning. The shoe adapts to the shape of your foot, providing comfort and support during long matches.

FUNCTION: Padel - Court Versatility
The biomechanically engineered outsole with vortex designs in the forefoot and heel enhances grip and rotational freedom, ensuring quick pivots and agility on all types of court surfaces. The Duralast™ outsole offers high durability, making it an excellent choice for players who demand reliable traction and stability.

title: Hurakn Pro Men's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

What you wear on the court influences your game and also the planet. 21% of the total weight of Wilson's Hurakn Pro padel shoes is made from recycled material. Another great advantage of these environmentally friendly shoes is the sole, specifically designed for movement on the padel court. They are also designed to maximize agility, with an inner sock-like construction that provides support when you lunge for the ball. The highly responsive EVA midsole keeps your feet feeling fresh after three full sets.

title: Hurakn Team Women's Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

Step onto the padel court with reliable and comfortable footwear confidently with the Hurakn Team. Featuring a Duralast outsole for maximum abrasion resistance and traction on the padel court, they allow you to move with conviction between every shot. The Hurakn Team has a 12 mm heel-to-toe drop and R-DST+ EVA material in the midsole for an excellent combination of cushioning and rebound. A reliable choice for recreational padel players, the Hurakn Team combines comfortable performance with a bright and vibrant design for a memorable look.

title: Hurakn Pro Women's Padel Shoes
description:
Description:

What you wear on the court influences your game and also the planet. 21% of the total weight of Wilson's Hurakn Pro padel shoes is made from recycled material. Another great advantage of these environmentally friendly shoes is the sole, specifically designed for movement on the padel court. They are also designed to maximize agility, with an inner sock-like construction that provides support when you lunge for the ball. The highly responsive EVA midsole keeps your feet feeling fresh after three full sets.

title: Bela Tour Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

Designed by padel legend Fernando Belasteguín, who served as our source of inspiration, the Bela Tour padel shoes are perfect for the advanced padel player looking to take their game to the next level. Technological upgrades, including a single-piece 4D torsion chassis and a 360° padel-specific outsole, make these shoes even more comfortable and stable when sprinting and turning on the padel court. Add to that the fact that the mesh is 100% recycled, the sockliner is 50% recycled, and the TPU film is 55% recycled, and you'll be untouchable in these sustainable shoes.

title: Bela Tour Padel Shoe
description:
Description:

Designed by padel legend Fernando Belasteguín, who served as our source of inspiration, the Bela Tour padel shoes are perfect for the advanced padel player looking to take their game to the next level. Technological upgrades, including a single-piece 4D torsion chassis and a 360° padel-specific outsole, make these shoes even more comfortable and stable when sprinting and turning on the padel court. Add to that the fact that the mesh is 100% recycled, the sockliner is 50% recycled, and the TPU film is 55% recycled, and you'll be untouchable in these sustainable shoes.

title: THE ROGER Advantage Pro
description:
Modern tennis look

A sleek, refined silhouette that holds its own on court and off. Versatile, stylish and modern. Playful, premium logo details elevate the aesthetic.


Light and strong

A lightweight, breathable upper – to keep your feet cool and comfortable – that doesn't compromise on durability and performance.


Responsive cushioning

Hidden CloudTec® and Speedboard® delivers the right mix of responsive cushioning, flexibility, support and stability for on court dynamics.

title: THE ROGER Clubhouse Pro
description:
Suits all racket sports

Tennis, padel, or pickleball? With THE ROGER Clubhouse Pro, you can do it all. Ideal for casual players, this versatile tennis shoe adapts to multiple racket sports thanks to its full-length herringbone outsole. From clay to hard court, you can grip and glide on various surfaces.


Stable yet agile

For the ultimate combination of stability and agility, we built a 3/4 nylon blend Speedboard® into the heel and midfoot, leaving your forefoot free to flex. Reinforcements on the upper keep your feet locked firmly in place. (And protect against tears when you're sliding into shots.)


Plush and cushioned

Soft, yet responsive. The Helion™ superfoam midsole is dynamic enough for the court, yet comfy enough for casual wear. Built into the outsole, hidden CloudTec® elements provide a plush layer of cushioning, creating a bouncier ride than competition-grade court shoes.

title: THE ROGER Pro 2 Clay
description:
Breathability, boosted.

With its abrasion-resistant mesh upper and perforated tongue, THE ROGER Pro 2 Clay offers unmatched airflow in a super light package. Feet stay fresh and feel fast – so you're always ready to make that winning shot.


Grip, slide and glide

With its full-length herringbone outsole, THE ROGER Pro 2 Clay allows you to execute consistent moves on the court. Its sticky zigzag tread grips the surface, while deep grooves allow the clay to drop out when the shoe flexes. Experience unparalleled traction with every sprint and slide.


Built for intensity

You asked for more durability. So we designed THE ROGER Pro 2 Clay with longevity in mind. Take the reinforced toe cap to protect against wear and tear. Or the lateral TPU clips, strategically placed to prevent tears in the upper. Everything you need to bring the intensity as you slide into shots.

title: Bullpadel Men's Hack Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Orange
description:
As used by Paquito Navarro, the Bullpadel Hack Vibram offers great durability from the reinforced toe of compact rubber injected, this shoe is ideal for those players that use them intensively. The technical mesh gives great breathability and lightness, as well as the rear stabiliser on the heel area. It also includes ORTHOLITE insole.  

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are wider in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Hack Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Black
description:
As used by Paquito Navarro, the Bullpadel Hack Vibram offers great durability from the reinforced toe of compact rubber injected, this shoe is ideal for those players that use them intensively. The technical mesh gives great breathability and lightness, as well as the rear stabiliser on the heel area. It also includes ORTHOLITE insole.  

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are wider in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Indiga 25I Padel Shoes Grey
description:
Central Stabiliser: Made from TPU, this enhances the stability and reinforces the central structure of the foot arch. 

Thermo Sealed: Seamless design reduces weight and offers better flexibility and fit.

Stitch Insole: EVA rubber insole enhances cushioning and comfort.

Breathmesh: Inner mesh fabric lining for better breathability.

Sole Shield: High sides and toe cap for increased durability.

Herringbone Sole: Designed specifically for padel courts.

title: Bullpadel Men's Ionic 25l Padel Shoes White Royal
description:
Along with the Bullpadel IONIC rackets, this shoe is used by Alex Arroyo & Javier Leal. Hybrid 360 sole offers incredible traction and lateral stability whilst the rear stabiliser keeps your foot locked in place!

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are wider in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Indiga 25I Padel Shoes Navy
description:
Central Stabiliser: Made from TPU, this enhances the stability and reinforces the central structure of the foot arch. 

Thermo Sealed: Seamless design reduces weight and offers better flexibility and fit.

Stitch Insole: EVA rubber insole enhances cushioning and comfort.

Breathmesh: Inner mesh fabric lining for better breathability.

Sole Shield: High sides and toe cap for increased durability.

Herringbone Sole: Designed specifically for padel courts.

title: Bullpadel Men's Vertex Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Green
description:
As used on the Pro Tour by Juan Tello the Vertex Vibram 25 shoe is a great choice for players looking for high performance and comfort. 

TOUGHTOE: Rubber toe cap is highly resistant to abrasion to increase durability

LATERAL MOVEMENT: Central channel in the sole offers increased support in the heel for better stability on lateral movements

ORTHOLITE: Removable OrthoLite insole

HYBRID 360: Hybrid sole design combines herringbone and microstuds for optimal traction on padel courts

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are narrower in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Ionic 25l Padel Shoes Dark Blue
description:
Along with the Bullpadel IONIC rackets, this shoe is used by Alex Arroyo & Javier Leal. Hybrid 360 sole offers incredible traction and lateral stability whilst the rear stabiliser keeps your foot locked in place!

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are wider in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Neuron Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Red
description:
Designed specifically for Fede Chingotto, the Bullpadel Men's Neuron Vibram 25l Padel Shoes feature a new VIBRAM sole engineered to boost agility and responsiveness on the court. The advanced technical mesh upper enhances breathability and reduces weight, allowing for swift, dynamic movement. Heat-sealed, virtually seamless construction ensures exceptional comfort, minimizing irritation during intense play. These shoes perfectly balance lightweight design with durable performance to support Fede’s lively and precise style of game.

Please note: these shoes fit small, we would recommend going up at least half a size.

title: Bullpadel Women's Next 25l Padel Shoes Blue
description:
Flex Rift: Cross channels in the sole help natural foot flexion.

Thermo Sealed: Seamless design reduces weight and offers better flexibility and fit.

Stitch Insole: EVA rubber insole enhances cushioning and comfort.

Breathmesh: Inner mesh fabric lining for better breathability.

Sole Shield: High sides and toe cap for increased durability.

Hybrid 360 Sole: hybrid sole design combines herringbone with micro studs for incredible traction.

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length, but are wider in the toe box.

title: Bullpadel Men's Performance Comfort 24 Padel Shoes Navy
description: A great choice for players at all levels, the Bullpadel Performance Comfort offers all the grip provided by a pure herringbone sole. It includes the ROTOX system, which facilitates turns, providing a perfect balance between grip and mobility. Ideal for courts with more sand.

title: Bullpadel Men's Hybrid Fly 25I Padel Shoe White Orange
description:
Engineered for competitive padel players, the Bullpadel Men's Hybrid Fly 25I combines cutting-edge sole technology with court-ready performance. The innovative hybrid sole features the ROTOX easy pivot point for seamless directional changes and the X-TRA BASE system, delivering superior lateral stability across synthetic surfaces. This design philosophy prioritises unrestricted movement, enabling you to execute shots with confidence and reach peak performance levels. 

Please note: these shoes run big, we would recommend going down at least half a size.

title: Bullpadel Women's Pearl Vibram 25I Padel Shoes Black
description: Engineered for competitive padel, these Bullpadel Women's Pearl shoes feature a VIBRAM sole designed for explosive court movement without compromising durability. The jacquard and mesh upper, bonded with seamless heat seals, delivers superior breathability during intense rallies. Reinforced toe box protection shields against court friction, whilst the heel support and mid-sole anti-torsion system provide the stability needed for dynamic lateral play. Lightweight yet robust, these shoes combine technical innovation with performance-driven design.

title: Bullpadel Women's Next 25V Padel Shoes White
description:
Flex Rift: Cross channels in the sole help natural foot flexion.

Thermo Sealed: Seamless design reduces weight and offers better flexibility and fit.

Stitch Insole: EVA rubber insole enhances cushioning and comfort.

Breathmesh: Inner mesh fabric lining for better breathability.

Sole Shield: High sides and toe cap for increased durability.

Hybrid 360 Sole: hybrid sole design combines herringbone with micro studs for incredible traction.

title: Bullpadel Women's Ionic 25l Padel Shoes White Orange
description: Engineered for developing players seeking dependable court performance, the Bullpadel Women's Ionic 25l delivers enhanced stability and robust support during intense padel sessions. Built with precision construction, these shoes provide the foundational control and confidence needed as players progress their game. The striking white and orange colourway combines style with functionality, ensuring you look sharp whilst maintaining the structural integrity required for competitive play. Ideal for athletes prioritising stability and support on court.

title: Bullpadel Women's Elite 24 Padel Shoes Light Blue
description: As used by Gemma Triay, the Bullpadel Elite 24 padel shoe adapts to all types of courts and level of game. The seamless injected rubber toecap will keep the toecap and inside of the foot protected, whilst the lycra padding on the heel makes it an ideal shoe for the most delicate feet.

title: Bullpadel Men's Hybrid Fly 25I Padel Shoe Steel Blue
description:
Engineered for competitive padel players, the Bullpadel Men's Hybrid Fly 25I combines cutting-edge sole technology with court-ready performance. The innovative hybrid sole features the ROTOX easy pivot point for seamless directional changes and the X-TRA BASE system, delivering superior lateral stability across synthetic surfaces. This design philosophy prioritises unrestricted movement, enabling you to execute shots with confidence and reach peak performance levels. 

Please note: these shoes run big, we would recommend going down at least half a size.

title: Bullpadel Men's Ionic 25V Padel Shoes White
description: Along with the Bullpadel IONIC rackets, this shoe is used by Alex Arroyo & Javier Leal. Hybrid 360 sole offers incredible traction and lateral stability whilst the rear stabiliser keeps your foot locked in place!

title: Bullpadel Men's Xplo Vibram 25I Padel Shoes Steel Blue
description:
Engineered for speed-focused padel players, these Bullpadel Men's Xplo Vibram 25I shoes feature an innovative sole developed in partnership with VIBRAM. The hybrid sole design prioritises lightweight performance, allowing for quicker directional changes across the court. The distinctive double-height herringbone pattern delivers enhanced traction whilst maintaining responsive movement, striking the ideal balance between agility and grip. 

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are narrower in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.

title: Bullpadel Men's Neuron Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Navy
description:
Designed specifically for Fede Chingotto, the Bullpadel Men's Neuron Vibram 25l Padel Shoes feature a new VIBRAM sole engineered to boost agility and responsiveness on the court. The advanced technical mesh upper enhances breathability and reduces weight, allowing for swift, dynamic movement. Heat-sealed, virtually seamless construction ensures exceptional comfort, minimizing irritation during intense play. These shoes perfectly balance lightweight design with durable performance to support Fede’s lively and precise style of game.

Please note: these shoes fit small, we would recommend going up at least half a size.

title: Bullpadel Men's Hack Vibram 25l Padel Shoes Bubblegum
description:
As used by Paquito Navarro, the Bullpadel Hack Vibram offers great durability from the reinforced toe of compact rubber injected, this shoe is ideal for those players that use them intensively. The technical mesh gives great breathability and lightness, as well as the rear stabiliser on the heel area. It also includes ORTHOLITE insole.  

Please note: these shoes fit true to size on length but are wider in the toe box than other Bullpadel models.
